JobFullDesc: About the TeamUber's Marketplace team creates the technology behind our ridesharing marketplace by connecting riders with drivers at the push of a button. Our solutions expand user access, deliver reliability, and provide more transportation choices to users across our global markets.About the RoleThe Uber Technical Program Management (TPM) team plays a critical role in executing high-impact org-wide initiatives and continuously improving processes to increase the effectiveness of our product and engineering organizations. The role demands great technical depth, principled thinking, a high bar for quality, and ambitious innovation. You will work alongside a cross-functional team from Engineering, Product, Data Science, Operations, etc. in a fast-paced environment to build and deliver technology solutions that power our ridesharing marketplace. You should be comfortable in uncharted territory as we build innovative technologies that can handle the scale. We need your skills and enthusiasm to make it happen. A TPM in this role will structure and drive complex cross-team technical initiatives across diverse products and teams within Marketplace and gain a breadth of experience.
